client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Snijders Schipper's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Snijders Schipper is a 30 year old Family Office Manager from Netherlands.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Snijders Schipper is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
In 2012, Snijders finished his secondary school education at Openbaar Lyceum Hengelo.
Snijders completed his university education at Utrecht University in 2018.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Snijders Schipper is a 30 year old and comes from Netherlands.
Snijders Schipper began his professional journey as a Family Office Manager at ING Private Banking in 2019, laying the foundation for future success.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
While working, he saved 50000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns townhouse in Rotterdam, where he resides. It is worth 1449000 EUR.

He purchased house in Boxtel, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1800000 EUR.
On top of that he inherited a beautiful villa in Enschede, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 2460000 EUR.
He inherited a significant sum of 2130000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Real Estate Developer, in 2019, which he has wisely invested.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
